summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Wednesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 22
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Wednesday, with 18 declining and only one rising.
Bitcoin fell 4.9% to $26,760 by market close.
